name: My 21st Birthday
description:
GMTK Game Jam

Save your 21st birthday from absolute destruction. As the party is progressing more and more friends are doing questionable things. Prevent them from stealing your furniture, breaking the TV or maybe setting the fridge on fire. There are many challenges and as the party is progressing more and more quests will occure .

Try to beat our devs highscore and post a picture if you did!

Made by Alex, Bennet and Marco
